lines.text: never get between a gun and its target.
punches are like bullets. If you don't make the first ones count, Scotty, you might just be finished.
a man on horseback has to divide his attention between his horse and his gun. So you cannot let them dismount.
Doc Holliday was the best shot in all the west. Him... not his pistol.

Him... and his pistol! There can be an experience of a lifetime in a gun. But it's not enough to be able to draw faster than the other guy if the other guy knows a trick that you don't know. In my day, we had to either learn the tricks... or we gave work to the gravediggers.
if you wound a man, you better kill him. Because sooner or later he's gonna kill you.
All right Scott, you can come with me, but don't get your hopes up to high, 'cause it's a dirty life.
Talby, now it's your turn. There's nobody out here left to take your place.
Punches are like bullets. If you don't make the first ones count, Scotty, you might just be finished.
when you start killing you can't stop it.
I hope he's dead, the bastard!
You're going to hell, Turner. Find out down there!
Hey, listen, stranger, what town is this?
Bowie. Bowie, at least for now.
Because it's going to be hell here pretty soon!
Show too much and you can't sell it.
